introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the Maintenance Now app. By using this application, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the application.

Elligibility.heading: Eligibility to obtain services
Elligibility.term1: Any adult (18 years and older) has the right to use the Maintenance Now application and request the maintenance services provided.
Elligibility.term2: The user must provide accurate and correct information when registering in the application and when requesting services.
Elligibility.term3: Hof Al Manazel reserves the right to refuse to provide the service to any user if he violates the terms and conditions or if he provides incorrect information.
Elligibility.term4: Services are only available in areas covered by the Maintenance Now app and may vary by geographic region.

guarantees.heading: Pledges and guarantees
guarantees.term1: Maintenance Now is committed to providing high-quality maintenance services through a qualified and trained staff.
guarantees.term2: Maintenance Now guarantees the quality of services provided for 30 days from the date of service provision.
guarantees.term3: If any problem arises with the service provided during the warranty period, Maintenance Now is obligated to re-provide the service free of charge.
guarantees.term4: Maintenance Now does not guarantee malfunctions resulting from misuse or external factors that are not related to the service provided.

rights.heading: intellectual property rights
rights.term1: All content displayed in the Maintenance Now app, including text, images, graphics, logos, and app design, is the exclusive intellectual property of Maintenance Now.
rights.term2: None of the contents of the Application may be copied, reproduced, distributed or modified without prior written permission from Maintenance Now.
rights.term3: The User grants Maintenance Now a non-exclusive right to use any comments or suggestions provided by the User to improve the Application or Services.

payment.heading: Payment
payment.term1: The full value of the service must be paid in advance when booking through the payment methods available in the application.
payment.term2: Maintenance Now accepts payments via cash, credit cards, and e-wallets approved in the app.
payment.term3: A electronic invoice is issued for each payment made through the application in PDF format after the customer's request.

responsibility.heading: Legal responsibility
responsibility.term1: Maintenance Now is not responsible for any damages resulting from the user's misuse of the services provided or failure to follow instructions.
responsibility.term2: Maintenance Now is not responsible for loss or damage to personal property during the provision of the service unless it is proven that this resulted from the negligence of the maintenance technician.
responsibility.term3: The user is responsible for providing a safe environment for the maintenance technician while providing the service

limitations.heading: limitation of liability
limitations.term1: Maintenance Now's responsibility is limited to the value of the service paid by the user.
limitations.term2: Maintenance Now is not responsible for loss or damage to personal property during the provision of the service unless it is proven that this resulted from the negligence of the maintenance technician.
limitations.term3: Maintenance Now does not guarantee that the application will be available continuously and without interruption or that the application will be free of technical errors.
limitations.term4: Maintenance Now disclaims any responsibility for any delay in providing the service as a result of circumstances beyond its control, such as natural disasters or major technical malfunctions.

security.heading: security
security.term1: Maintenance Now is committed to protecting user data and taking all necessary security measures to protect personal information.
security.term2: All financial and personal data traded through the application is encrypted.
security.term3: Maintenance Now does not share user data with any third party without obtaining the user's consent or in cases required by law.
security.term4: The user must keep his login data confidential and not share it with others.

law.heading: Applicable law and dispute resolution
law.term1: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the country in which Maintenance Now operates.
law.term2: If any dispute arises between the User and Maintenance Now, it will be resolved amicably in the first place.
law.term3: If an amicable solution is not possible, arbitration or the competent courts in the country in which Maintenance Now operates will be resorted to.
law.term4: The Arabic version of these terms and conditions is considered the approved version in the event of any conflict with any other translation.

approval.heading: Acknowledgment of approval of the terms and conditions
approval.content: By agreeing to these terms and conditions, you acknowledge that you have read and understood all of the terms contained therein and agree to be bound by them.

items.question: Why should I use the Siyana Now platform?
items.answer: Siyana Now makes it easier for homeowners and businesses to access a variety of maintenance services with minimal effort, at the right time, and at competitive prices — all with a work guarantee.

items.question: Is there a warranty on the work?
items.answer: Yes, all our service providers are committed to offering a warranty for their services, according to the app’s terms and service agreement. If a provider fails to honor the warranty, our support team will ensure that your rights are protected or that the provider fulfills their obligation, ensuring you have the best experience with the platform.

items.question: What happens if I cancel my order?
items.answer: Canceling an order means the customer no longer wishes to proceed with the service. The customer can cancel before the scheduled time through the app or by contacting customer support. Repeated cancellations or failure to answer phone confirmations may result in temporary suspension according to the platform’s fake order policy.

items.question: What should I do if the service provider is late?
items.answer: If the provider is late, the customer should contact the app’s customer service center. The support team will follow up on the provider’s status. If the provider fails to arrive on time, a warning will be issued to prevent recurrence. The platform also allows you to rate the provider’s punctuality and professionalism.

testimonialSection.title: What Our Customers Say About Us

testimonial1.name: Mohamed Mostafa
testimonial1.review: I dealt with Maintenance Now initially with concern, but after the first experience, my perspective changed completely. From the moment they arrived at my home, I felt comfortable with their professionalism. We hope they continue their professional work, accuracy, and quality. When I need any service, I will deal with Maintenance Now without hesitation, regardless of the type of work. I trust this company completely.
